"Let me end this!": "You don't have to be afraid of me."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "Fixing the world, one scoundrel at a time!"
"You wanna play too? It'll be fun!"
"So many weapons, Aphelios. The deadliest is your faith."
"Let me end this!": "Condemned to darkness, where our power grows."
"Coward! May you die with your eyes closed."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "I am the voice of the silence."
"Ready to set the world on fire? Heheheh..."

"Let me end this!": "Shall I turn in my badge and rifle as well?"

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "Precision is the difference between a butcher and a surgeon."
"Let me end this!": "I will wait for you to be better."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "You'd wish the world you know to end! Yeeeesssss..."
"I'm up to snuff, and gots me an ace machine!"
"Let me end this!": "That just goes to show you you're nothin' but a Whiskey Delta!"

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "It's not how much time you have, it's how you use it."
"Only the spider is safe in her web."

"Let me end this!": "Hey, your loss. But I get it."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "Neither the flames nor the depths could claim me."

"Let me end this!": "Feat is the first of many foes."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "Behold, the might of the Shadow Isles."
"I'm not big on sermons - broken bones teach better lessons."
"By my will, this shall be finished."
"In carnage, I bloom, like a flower in the dawn."
"Rules are made to be broken... like buildings! Or people!"
"Let me end this!": "Aww, c'mon, what's the worst that could happen?"

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "Better to fight, than to live in fear."
"Are you the hunter... or the prey?"
"Let me end this!": "You wouldn't last a day in the Void."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "Agony, ecstasy, peace. Every passing has a beauty all its own."
"The balance of power must be preserved."
"I find courage unpredictable, it's total insanity you can rely on!"
"Let me end this!": "Oh, I knew you was all yeller!"

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "The Black Rose shall bloom once more."
"I will bury the world in ice."
"Everybody dies. Some just need a little help."
"Let me end this!": "You don't have the heart for this."
"But all my light puns would've brightened your day."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "Stick with me! I'll keep you warm." Fuemigo cheers."
"I am bound, but I will not break."
"I decide what the tide will bring."
"The cycle of life and death continues. We will live, they will die."

"Let me end this!": "I don't blame you. I'm quite strong."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "Every adventure is better with a friend!" (Creature noises) *laughs*

"Let me end this!": "C'mon, I won't hurt you. I promise!"

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "We will kill your enemies. That will be fun."

"Let me end this!": "Flee, and the spear will find your back."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "I'm no hero—just a Yordle with a hammer."
"Let me end this!": "Seems you left your brave pants at home. Want me to wait while you go get them?"
"You are right to fear my greatness."
"I'd keep my head down if I were you."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "Nothing gets in, no one gets out."

"Let me end this!": "'Ey, never pick a fight you can't win."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "I always take my toll - blood, or gold."

"Let me end this!": "(Champion) smacks her hands on her etwahl."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "Fear the power you do not see."

"Let me end this!": "Cling to hope... it is all you have."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "Let us hunt those who have fallen to darkness."

"Let me end this!": "If I want your opinion, I'll beat it out of you."
"You have the heart of a weakling."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "I can never resist an invitation to dance."
"Let me end this!": "Fine, I'll just be over here... sharpening my feathers."

"Now, hear the silence of annihilation!": "Death is like the wind - always by my side."
